merata shighra aarthika wardhanayak sandaha thel gaweshanaya, widuliya, adhyapana, krushikarma athulu kshethra rasak anapanath janadhipathi dewani dhura kalaya aarambha wimata pera parlimenthuwe sammatha kara ganimata rajaya thiranaya kara thibe.ee sandaha abhinawa parlimenthuwa aarambhaka dinaya wana ape්ral 22 wanida sita janadhipathiwaraya dewani warata diwrum dimata niyamitha nowambar 18 wanida athara kala parasaya yoda ganna bawa, kabinat prakashaka apanayana sanwardhana ha jathyanthara welenda katayuthu pilibanda amathi mahacharya ji. el. piris mahatha pawasiya.mehidi widulibala ha balashakthi, krushikarma, deshiya karmantha, adhyapanaya athulu anshayan rasak thoragena ee sandaha wishesha awadhanaya yomu kara athi bawa ee mahatha sandahan keleya.rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwe eeye (04) pawathi kabinat thirana danumdime madhya sakachchawakadi amathiwaraya ese prakasha keleya.dewani dhura kalayen pasu arambaena pas awurudu palana kalaya thuladi kisidu awahirathawakin thorawa aarthikaya shighra lesa wardhanaya kara ganima mehi mulika aramuna bawada hethema kiya.widulibala ha balashakthi gam danaw karagena yamin nawa karmantha shala athikara raki raksha bihikirimata memangin hakiwana bawa pawasana amathiwaraya me wasaredi jathika widuli paddhathiyata megawot 2000k uthpadanaya kirimata haki bawada kiya.memangin samata widuliya dima badu mila pahatha helima, raki raksha athi kirimata hakiwana bawada piris mahatha sandahan keleya.
sha hoda lamayek...
